statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT card_number, merchant_name FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id), AVG(transaction_amount) FROM financial_transactions WHERE merchant_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE account_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_detection_result = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transaction_amount, fraud_detection_result FROM transactions JOIN fraud_detection ON transactions.transaction_id = fraud_detection.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT t.*, f.fraud_detection_result FROM transactions t JOIN fraud_detection f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE AND amount <= 500;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, a.account_type FROM transactions t INNER JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, c.email, a.balance FROM customers c INNER JOIN accounts a ON c.customer_id = a.account_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.account_type, c.first_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id INNER JOIN customers c ON a.account_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_accounts;
SELECT account_number, account_balance FROM financial_accounts WHERE account_balance > 5000;
SELECT account_id, account_type FROM financial_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM financial_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC, account_number ASC
SELECT account_id, account_number, account_balance FROM financial_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT t.*, f.account_type FROM transactions t INNER JOIN financial_accounts f ON t.account_id = f.account_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT f.account_id, f.account_balance, a.algorithm_name FROM financial_accounts f LEFT JOIN ai_algorithms a ON f.account_id = a.algorithm_id ORDER BY a.algorithm_accuracy DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = true;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_status, processing_time FROM transactions_history WHERE processing_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, fraud_score, fraud_description FROM fraud_records WHERE fraud_score > 0.8 ORDER BY fraud_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions_history WHERE transaction_status = 'Failed' ORDER BY processing_time ASC;
